body:
This is how it works. Look at your room around you. Choose one item and post it, you have to say it if you have it or not, then you say something :)

e.g

zzocmzzoj: A can of coke?

em2mr4snart: Yep, Do you have a Cat in your room?

EpicMan304: Nope, Etc, etc.

An ancient Dell
